comments.body: Can you open a PR or issue upstream so that this gets fixed for the next release if it hasn’t been already?
Yep, this has been fixed in the zeus repo now https://github.com/minaskar/zeus/pull/16, so the patch won't be necessary for the next release.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +10,14 @@  sha256: b291e734ef65c05b2fb6c3f8867066133075f7a8e95c9489d21ae06062365693
  patches:
    # requirements and README.md aren't packaged
    - remove-requirements.patch
